title.narrative: Higher Education Research for Innovation and Competitiveness Project

description.narrative: The Project development objective is to strengthen the quality and relevance of higher education and research in Montenegro throughreforming the higher education finance and quality assurance systems and by strengthening research and development capabilities.

title.narrative: Complete external evaluation of 3 main universities, utilizing new quality assurance and accreditation measures developed in accordance with Bologna-defined EU norms and practices.
Establish one pilot Center of Excellence
Establishment of an Office within the MoE to coordinate bilateral and multilateral agreement programs available to Montenegrin students and academic staff
Number of students receiving scholarships for master’s, doctoral and postdoctoral studies abroad.
Number of grants awarded to faculties, programs, and institutions.
Establish 10 public/private or international R&D partnerships and/or business start-ups with research institutes or university faculties.
Number of research and development subprojects implemented.
Increase in the number of Montenegrin researchers who participate in international R&D projects.
National Qualifications Framework developed and adopted for 180 programs

baseline.value: Baseline competencies not developed for any program

actual.value: NQF is being implemented via support outside the HERIC project.

title.narrative: Development of framework for future CoE.

baseline.value: Framework for future CoE not developed

title.narrative: Implementation of new higher education funding model.
Increase in the perception of relevance of higher education programs and degrees
